org.openmobster.server.api.service
Interface MobileServiceBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivateCommand, AgentProvisioner, AppStore, ConsoleService, DeactivateCommand, DemoMobileBeanService, MockMobileBeanService, PingMobileBeanService, PushTriggerService, RegisterCommand, ResetPasswordCommand, ShowUsersCommand, StatusMobileBeanService
public interface MobileServiceBean

Represents a service side Mobile Service Bean component. This components receives remote coarse grain service invocations from the devices It is to be used by Developers to expose back end services to devices

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com

Method Summary
 Response invoke(Request request)
          Receives service invocations from the device side
 

Method Detail

invoke

Response invoke(Request request)
Receives service invocations from the device side

Parameters:
request - service request
Returns:
service response with appropriate data within the context of the application
